name: my-coordinates
description: A react app supported by typescript.

scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "nodemon --ignore 'client/*'" "npm run client" "cd server && npm run start"
scripts.develop: concurrently -k "cd server && npm run build && npm run serve" "cd client && npm run start"
